## TransactionOptions type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TransactionOptions = {
    from: Address;
    to: Address;
    gas?: Quantity;
    gasPrice?: Quantity;
    value?: Quantity;
    data: string;
    nonce?: Quantity;
};
```
